@LornaBranton @EastMidRailway Yes quite ğŸ¤¯ And it was changed from the original booking because of disruption. The limited info fields in the refund form aren't fit for purpose given the epic disaster that was EMR on Weds at St Pancras!

@EastMidRailway This is the information retained in the app about the ticket. If you encourage customers to use etickets that disappear after the journey, how can you require this to process refunds? https://t.co/zMH1o9p6Xl

@EastMidRailway Hi again @EastMidRailway I've had this email re my refund. My ticket was an eticket which is no longer on my app. Can you confirm a screenshot of the booking info will be sufficient for this. https://t.co/Xv3YDpKRMr
@OrendaBooks @will_carver It really stands up doesn't it! Watched it with my 16yo recently and it blew her mindğŸ˜„ https://t.co/q9IrcGqIHJ

@EastMidRailway I appreciate that. The circumstances were extraordinary. But so much of what caused difficulties was the very poor information sharing - misleading, incorrect, badly organised processes and comms. This was all within EMR's control.

@EastMidRailway It's worth noting too that at no point has anyone from EMR said sorry to me or as far as I'm aware any of the other customers who had a dreadful time on Tuesday and yesterday. Very odd.

@EastMidRailway Have had an email saying our train was delayed by 54 mins. We were delayed by 25 hours. We've just completed a form for compensation but the fields are inadequate to describe the situation. I'd like reassurance you'll reimburse customers without wasting more of our time.

@EastMidRailway It's in the thread. Supposed to be travelling with you St Pancras to Sheffield on 19 July. Changed to 20 July at 10.02. Was stuck in overcrowded station with no information for hours. Eventually got on 14.32 (which was showing on app and station screens as cancelled).
@EastMidRailway What information do you need?

@EastMidRailway Hi again @EastMidRailway We're trying to complete our form for compensation and this form is not fit for purpose to describe the situation yesterday. Plse tell me the compensation requests will be dealt with with some flexibility?

Anyway, I got carried away again last night! And made a montage to celebrate the end of series one. 

If you're wondering what the programme is all about, this is also a nice introduction to the format and some of the awesome chats we had with our guestsâœ¨https://t.co/moLj6xhId5

We've now done a full series - four interviews with superb authors about the books, TV & films that mean the most to them, and how they've influenced their writing.

My fear of making a fool of myself was very real - but we've done it! And the response has been bloody lush.

A few mths ago, my gorgeous friend @elnorry_writer and I decided to start a programme to celebrate enthusiasm and interview writers about their passions. 

Because of limited time to edit, we decided live was the way to go and to say I was scared would be an understatement!
